title: New Kali Grit helmet brings the next generation of protection to road, gravel riders
content:
It’s been a minute since Kali has released a new helmet, but the Grit changes that with a feature-packed lid for road and gravel riders. Loading pretty much every safety technology Kali has into a single helmet, it covers fit, form and function…as long as you like Black. The Grit looks normal enough, but a […]

The post New Kali Grit helmet brings the next generation of protection to road, gravel riders appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
